snippet: DIMON--Themis and Ted. It is with great sadness that the Board, staff and membership of the New York Psychoanalytic Society and Institute and the Board of the Helix Center have learned of the deaths of Themis and Ted Dimon who were deeply committed and devoted friends of both institutions. We extend our heartfelt condolences to their family. Ian Buckingham, President, NYPSI; Edward Nersessian, Director, The Helix Center 1/3
lead_paragraph: DIMON--Themis and Ted. It is with great sadness that the Board, staff and membership of the New York Psychoanalytic Society and Institute and the Board of the Helix Center have learned of the deaths of Themis and Ted Dimon who were deeply committed and devoted friends of both institutions. We extend our heartfelt condolences to their family. Ian Buckingham, President, NYPSI; Edward Nersessian, Director, The Helix Center 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DIMON, THEMIS AND TED
